mapper.insert: insert into read_times_recommend (customer_id, message_id, `value`, update_time) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, now())
mapper.select: select customer_id, message_id, `value`, update_time from read_times_recommend

select message.id,message.titleText,message.msgType,staff.`name`,message.update_time from( select message_id,`value` from read_times_recommend where customer_id = #{customerId} order by `value` desc limit 0,5 ) rtr left join message on message.id = rtr.message_id left join staff on staff.userid = message.create_user_id
